    • 方法详细资料

      • withBackgroundColor

        public StyleableToast.Builder withBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor)
        设置背景色
        参数:
        backgroundColor - if not set the default color grey will be used.

      • withTextColor

        public StyleableToast.Builder withTextColor(int textColor)
        设置文本颜色
        参数:
        textColor - if not set the default color white will be used.

      • withDuration

        public StyleableToast.Builder withDuration(int duration)
        设置持续时间
        参数:
        duration - Sets the toast's duration. Either Toast.LENGTH_LONG or Toast.LENGTH_SHORT

      • withIcon

        public StyleableToast.Builder withIcon(int iconRes)
        设置图标
        参数:
        iconRes - The icon's resource which should be used within the toast

      • withIcon

        public StyleableToast.Builder withIcon(int iconRes,
                                       boolean spinIcon)
        设置图标及图标动画
        参数:
        iconRes - The icon's resource which should be used within the toast
        spinIcon - Enables spinning animation of the passed icon by its around its own center.

      • withStyle

        public StyleableToast.Builder withStyle(int style)
        设置样式
        参数:
        style - Style your toast via styles.xml and pass the style id R.style.xxx

        The attributes that must be used:

        android:textColor.
        android:textStyle.
        android:fontFamily. If custom font, just write the path to it like: "fonts/myfont.ttf"
        android:colorBackground.
        android:strokeWidth. API 21+
        android:strokeColor. API 21+
        android:radius. Corner radius
        android:alpha. Value between 1-255 where 255 is full solid
        android:icon.

      • withToastMessage

        public StyleableToast.Builder withToastMessage(String toastMessage)
        设置信息内容 Specify the message displayed in this Toast.
        参数:
        toastMessage - The message displayed in this Toast.

      • withBoldText

        public StyleableToast.Builder withBoldText()
        设置为粗体 Specify whether to display the Toast's message with a bold typeface. whether to display the Toast's message with a bold typeface.

      • withTextFont

        public StyleableToast.Builder withTextFont(android.graphics.Typeface typeface)
        设置文本字体
        参数:
        typeface - Set a different font than the standard sans-serif-condensed

      • withToastStroke

        public StyleableToast.Builder withToastStroke(int strokeWidth,
                                              int strokeColor)
        设置边框宽度和颜色
        Specify the Stroke for this Toast
        参数:
        strokeWidth - Width of the Toast's stroke
        strokeColor - Color of the Toast's stroke

      • withCornerRadius

        public StyleableToast.Builder withCornerRadius(int cornerRadius)
        设置圆角半径
        参数:
        cornerRadius - Sets the corner radius of the toast shape. Pass 0 for a flat rectangle shape

      • withMaxAlpha

        public StyleableToast.Builder withMaxAlpha()
        设置透明度 0-255
        Set the alpha/Transparency of the Toast background between 0-255. 255 is full opque and 0 is full transparency.

      • build

        public StyleableToast build()
        构建者模式的build方法 Build and returns the configured instance
        返回:
        The configured StyleableToast instance.

      • show

        public void show()
        显示 Build and displays the configured StyleableToast instance
